directions: In a small bowl combine the soy sauce, vinegar, sugar and peanut oil.
In a medium sized bowl toss the dressing with the chicken, scallions and noodles. Chill and serve.
ingredients: 1/2 cup diced cooked chicken breast meat
1 (3 ounce) package ramen noodles - cooked, drained and chilled
title: Oriental Chicken Salad
